author: A_Brickset_user
title: Very good motor
review:
This is a low rev, high torque motor. It comes with 8479 and some other sets. Technical description can be found at www.philohome.com/motors/motorcomp.htm

This is good for main driving motor in any model. It has internal gears to reduce rev (thus increasing torque) - so less extra cogs are necessary to reduce rev externally.
